originalTitle: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
title: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
content: The US president labels Noah a "total loser" over a joke he told on stage during the awards ceremony.

originalTitle: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
title: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
content: They were among 177 people seized last month from three churches in northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
title: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
content: The 24-year-old bagged her second-ever Grammy beating three Nigerians and a Ugandan.

originalTitle: Syrian forces deploy in Hasakah under ceasefire agreement with SDF
title: Syrian forces deploy in Hasakah under ceasefire agreement with SDF
content: Syrian forces move into the northeastern city, which was previously under the control of the Kurdish-led SDF.

originalTitle: Trump and Petro clash over how best to uproot Colombia’s cocaine crops
title: Trump and Petro clash over how best to uproot Colombia’s cocaine crops
content: As Gustavo Petro prepares to face Donald Trump in Washington, Colombia’s anti-drug strategy is under intense scrutiny.

originalTitle: 5-year-old Liam Ramos and father released from immigration detention
title: 5-year-old Liam Ramos and father released from immigration detention
content: Five-year-old Liam Ramos and his father have been released from a US immigration detention facility.

originalTitle: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
title: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
content: Jonas Gahr Støre says he agreed with Princess Mette-Marit's own remarks over her contacts with the late sex offender.

originalTitle: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
title: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
content: The footage, which is part of millions of files released by the US Department of Justice, shows the late sex offender being questioned by an unnamed interviewer.

originalTitle: 'Enemy' insults and questioning Putin: Steve Rosenberg on tightrope of reporting from Russia
title: 'Enemy' insults and questioning Putin: Steve Rosenberg on tightrope of reporting from Russia
content: The BBC's Russia editor reflects on the difficulties of working as a British journalist in Moscow.

originalTitle: Jacquet set for Liverpool medical before £60m summer move
title: Big News! Footballer Jeremy Jacquet is Moving Teams!
content:
Hello, my amazing friends! Your kid-friendly news reporter from Africa is here with super exciting news! Guess what? Something really big just happened in the world of football!

A Big Football Dream!

We have some fantastic news about a talented football player named Jeremy Jacquet. He is a super strong defender. He plays football really, really well! Jeremy Jacquet is going to move to a new team soon. This is a very big step in his football journey! It's like moving to a new school for a big adventure. His old team is called Rennes. They are from a country called France. His new team is super famous! It's called Liverpool Football Club.

Who is Jeremy Jacquet?

Jeremy Jacquet is a very good footballer. He plays in a special position called a defender. What does a defender do? A defender's job is to protect their team's goal. They stop the other team from scoring. It's like being a superhero for the goal! They run fast and kick the ball away from danger. Jeremy has been playing wonderfully for Rennes. Now, he will use his amazing skills for Liverpool. We are sure he will do a great job!

What is a 'Transfer' in Football?

Sometimes, a football player moves from one team to another. This is called a 'transfer'. It's like when you change from one class to another, but for football players. Teams might want a player because they are very good. The new team might think the player can help them win more games and trophies. It's a way for players to have new challenges and adventures. Did you know? Football players often dream of playing for very famous teams! This move is a dream come true for Jeremy.

Meet Liverpool FC (The Reds)!

Liverpool FC is one of the most famous football teams in the whole wide world! They are from a city called Liverpool in England. Their fans are known to be super passionate and loud! Their team colours are bright red! That's why they are also called 'The Reds'. Have you ever seen a football match where a team wears all red? It looks very strong! Liverpool has won many, many trophies. They have some of the best players in the world. Jeremy Jacquet will join these fantastic players. Imagine playing with the best! Did you know? Many children here in Africa love to watch Liverpool play! They wear their red shirts and cheer loudly for their favourite team.

A Big Number! What is £60 Million?

Now, for the really big number! Liverpool is going to pay £60 million for Jeremy Jacquet. Wow! That is a super, super big amount of money! It's hard to imagine how much money that is. It's enough money to build many, many schools or buy thousands and thousands of toys! It's how much Liverpool thinks Jeremy is worth to their team. This money doesn't go to Jeremy directly. It goes to his old team, Rennes. It's like Rennes is getting paid for letting their star player move to a new adventure.

When Will Jeremy Join?

Jeremy Jacquet will join Liverpool 'in the summer'. What does that mean? It means he will start playing for his new team after the current football season ends. Summer is usually a time for holidays and sunny weather! For footballers, it's also a time to get ready for the next big season. Jeremy will have time to pack his bags and get ready for England. He will train with his new teammates and learn how they play. Then, when the new season starts, he will be ready to wear the famous red shirt!

Why This is Exciting for Kids!

This news is very exciting! It shows that if you work hard and chase your dreams, you can achieve amazing things. Jeremy Jacquet worked hard, and now he is moving to a top team. Many of you love playing football, right? Maybe you dream of being a footballer one day! Jeremy's story can inspire all of us to keep playing, keep practicing, and never give up on our dreams. Did you know? Football is the most popular sport in the whole world! People everywhere, including all across Africa, love to kick a ball around and watch exciting matches.

Let's Cheer for Jeremy!

So, let's all wish Jeremy Jacquet the best of luck with his new team, Liverpool! We hope he scores many goals (even as a defender, sometimes they score!) and helps 'The Reds' win more trophies. Keep watching the news for more exciting football stories. And keep playing football, my friends! Who knows, maybe one day we will be reporting YOUR big transfer news! It's always wonderful to see players from different countries come together to play the beautiful game. Football truly connects us all!
summary: Talented defender Jeremy Jacquet is moving from Rennes to the famous Liverpool football team for a huge amount of money in the summer, which is super exciting news for football fans everywhere!
whyMatters: This news matters because Jeremy Jacquet is a very good player joining a famous team, which means he will play with other great players and inspire kids who dream of playing football. It shows how hard work can lead to big adventures in sports!

originalTitle: Mateta's move from Palace to Milan in doubt
title: Mateta's move from Palace to Milan in doubt
content: Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta's move to AC Milan is in serious doubt over issues with his medical, according to multiple BBC Sport sources.

originalTitle: Forest make third bid worth £25m for Celtic's Engels
title: Forest make third bid worth £25m for Celtic's Engels
content: Nottingham Forest table a third offer for Celtic midfielder Arne Engels worth up to £25m.
